name: The Sigil of Cinder
text: The Will Unbound. Passive: when you manifest a Cinder card, its value can be shifted by -1, 0, or +1 during reveal resolution.

name: The Sigil of Steam
text: Sophic Temperance. Once per Chapter, after reveal, you may force your manifested card to count as Steam for Resonance checks.

name: The Sigil of the Akasha
text: Ancestral Memory. Passive: Akashic Swap costs become 0 Friction when the card you return to the Reservoir is Ether.

name: The Sigil of Stone
text: The Fixed Foundation. Once per Chapter, if the group Overshoots and you manifested Stone, Overshoot damage is prevented and the Golem gains +1 Friction instead.

name: The Sigil of Acid
text: Corrosive Transmutation. Passive: when your Acid manifestation matches the Law and triggers Resonance refill, you may discard up to 2 cards from your hand before refilling to capacity.
